description: A unique coupon code for a bulk coupon.

code.title: Coupon code
code.description: The code the customer enters to redeem the coupon.

state.title: State
state.description: Indicates if the unique coupon code is redeemable or why not.

bulk_coupon_id.title: Bulk Coupon ID
bulk_coupon_id.description: The Coupon ID of the parent Bulk Coupon

bulk_coupon_code.title: Bulk Coupon code
bulk_coupon_code.description: The Coupon code of the parent Bulk Coupon

redeemed_at.title: Redeemed at
redeemed_at.description: The date and time the unique coupon code was redeemed.

expired_at.title: Expired at
expired_at.description: The date and time the coupon was expired early or reached its `max_redemptions`.
